Articles.Content:
I present to you the P-SU-OCE (Proton-Suhoi Orbital Construction and Espionage). After many years of calculations and Construction the Proton-Suhoi company have been the first and most successful in creating the very first orbital construction and espionage station which houses a staff of 37 Kerbal Engineers and Military Personnel. The Station offers state of the art Tracking Satellites for signals from Kerban and Beyond. With its Mk 421 "Kerbaina Eye" it can zoom in to about 4million Kixels producing the most detailed photos of enemy emplacement, troops and bases on kerban. Also Due to the conflicts with other kerban nations such as the K.S.A and Dangers of space junk the P-SU-OCE is Loaded with a Experimental "Sunbeam Laser" which can destroy any incoming objects that can harm the station. Due to the high amount of solar panels the station can have its energy costs in the positive meaning that work can be done efficiently and without unexpected halts even if some of the Solar panels are Of need of repairs the internal battery Storage should keep it going until the repairs are complete.

*Off topic

Hi there I'm warguy142 and I've just begun playing kerbal space program for a while now and this is also my first post and build of a space station. I mostly dedicate my building for satellites and space-planes that can make it in to orbit and land back safely. Recently i have been working on my space plane called the Su-142 and so far have not had any luck Anyway I hope you like anything i build in the Future and i will be planning to do some models through blender just look out for Proton-Suhoi corp mark any time soon, Well that's all thanks

Well currently i have looked at the bottom of the page and it says i may not post attachment nor edit my posts so I've got to make everything count.

Oops sorry about that, new members have a limit on what they can do until their 5th post, it's a precaution against spammers.
